metadata.title: CVE-2020-12640 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Roundcube Webmail before 1.4.4 allows attackers to include local files andexecute code via directory traversal in a plugin name torcube_plugin_api.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12640` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-core - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-mysql - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-plugins - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.4+dfsg.1-1').
